About the Company: BGIL Films & Techynologies Ltd offers the following services post digital production, digital visual effects, digital grading, film restoration, film packaging, film scanning, film recording, graphics and film production, apart from these the company is also engaged in 3G Mobile Portal.The company has developed a state of art Digital Distribution Systems for the Industry and will soon be a front-liner in the field..The company also engagged in the business of Media & Entertainment, Information Technologies/Services.
